anime.name: Ojōsama wa H ga Osuki: The Animation
anime.info: Ojōsama wa H ga Osuki: The Animation
お嬢様はHがお好き ~THE ANIMATION~

Two young princess with different experience at life and also different tastes, one is a total nympho that loves to have a male companion that's totally submissed to her but in the end the so called "sex slave" ends taking control over the situation but he pays it by receiving some punishment from his princess. And the other princess is a conservatite one and timid but she also wants her companion to make her feel a women for the first time in her life with the help of her two young maidens.
"Ojōsama wa Kōcha ga Osuki" (お嬢様は紅茶がお好き) by Rekka Katakiri
Ojōsama wa H ga Osuki: The Animation @ Pink Pineapple (Adults Only!)
